    • Uses of Amount in io.electrum.prepaidutility.model

      Methods in io.electrum.prepaidutility.model that return Amount 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Amount Amount.amount(Long amount) 
      Amount Amount.currency(String currency) 
      Amount Token.getAmount()
      Monetary value of the token, exclusive of tax (value set to 0 for free token).
      Amount Tax.getAmount()
      Amount of tax levied in minor denomination.
      Amount ServiceCharge.getAmount()
      Amount charged for the service.
      Amount DebtRecoveryCharge.getAmount()
      Amount charged for debt recovery, in minor denomination.
      Amount DebtRecoveryCharge.getBalance()
      Remaining balance on this account.
      Amount MeterLookupResponse.getMaxAmount()
      Maximum purchase amount that can be requested by the customer.
      Amount MeterLookupResponse.getMinAmount()
      Minimum purchase amount that can be requested by the customer.
      Amount PurchaseRequest.getPurchaseAmount()
      Monetary amount, in minor denomination, of the requested token purchase.
